actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish National Historic Trails as a new category of trails within the National Trails System, to include the Iditarod Trail, Alaska, in the National Trails System as a National Historic Trail.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to establish National Historic Trails as a new category of trails within the National Trails System. Sets qualifications for designation as a National Historic Trail, including establishment through historic use and national significance with respect to any recreational use related to historic appreciation. Designates the Iditarod Trail, Alaska, as a national historic trail within the National Trails System.

titles.title: A bill to establish National Historic Trails as a new category of trails within the National Trails System, to include the Iditarod Trail, Alaska, in the National Trails System as a National Historic Trail.
